description: Try our easy to follow Raspberry & Lime Sparkling recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mocktail,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Raspberry,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Raspberry & Lime Sparkling Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blend raspberries until smooth. Place in a saucepan over medium heat and add juice, sugar and water.
Bring to boil then reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes, until syrupy. Set aside to cool. Strain syrup and refrigerate overnight.
To serve, pour 1 tablespoon of the syrup into each champagne glass.
